full_summary:
# Multiple Victoria-Class Spares Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Summary

The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of multiple Victoria-Class spares, consisting of:

* Analyzer gas systems
* Breathing apparatus with remote supply systems

The delivery of the requested items is to be made to the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

## Tender Requirements

The contractor is required to submit a proposal for the supply of the following items:

* Item 001: Analyzer gas (13 units, CFB Esquimalt)
* Item 002: Analyzer gas (12 units, CFB Halifax)
* Item 003: Breathing apparatus with remote supply (36 units, CFB Esquimalt)
* Item 004: Breathing apparatus with remote supply (24 units, CFB Halifax)

The contractor is required to submit equivalent or substitute products, if applicable, with the following information:

* Brand name and model
* Part number
* National Stock Number (NSN)
* Commercial and Government Entity (CAGE) code

## Tender Submission Guidelines

* Tender submissions must be made in either English or French.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Tender documents may be obtained from the Canada Buys website.

## Key Dates

* Tender closing date: February 12, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* Amendment date: February 12, 2024

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns related to this tender, please contact:

Aïcha Diallo
Aicha.Diallo@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

## Important Notes

* The tender is currently expired.
* The Contracting Authority is the Department of National Defence.
* The procurement method is competitive and traditional.
* The selection criteria are based on lowest price.
